meanings.definition: A structure found in the mitochondria of certain cells, consisting of a mass of densely staining material.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the nebenkerns appeared as a dense cluster in the cell.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the nebenkerns to understand its role in cell function.
meanings.sent3: The nebenkerns threw a tiny party inside the mitochondria.
meanings.sent4: The nebenkerns stood out like a dark cloud in the cell's powerhouse.
meanings.sent5: The nebenkerns looked like a tiny, dark island in the sea of the mitochondria.
